name: Honey, Where's My Coat?
description:
you really need your lucky coat to win that free xbox from a taco bell box

you see that blue line in the center of the screen? yea that blue line. make those squares feel some pain by obliterating them as close to the line as possible, you also get some more points if you do so you can buy yourself a new coat if you never find your old one

- arrow keys to obliterate those colors

- press x to stop(because you never find your lucky coat)

[BAD ENDING]

Credits

- GreenWorld for music

- sharpcdf for programming and art
